snippet.title: Here's The Terrible Road Trip Playlist You Made Us
snippet.content:
Image: Gizmodo This weekend, we raced a car against a plane from Sydney to Canberra. The car won, not because of the music we were listening to, but despite it.
There's a lot to like in here. There's Darryl Braithwaite. There's some Dre. There's some bloody John Williamson. But a dozen different covers of Mustang Sally and the complete unabridged works of Lee Kernaghan? Come on, guys.
You can still add to the playlist if you want to, but we reserve the right to skip our way through it merrily. []
WATCH MORE: Entertainment News

sindex.name: Terrible Road Trip Playlist You Made Us
